amendment.description: Amendment sought to immediately end all flood insurance subsidies on nonresidential, vacation, and second homes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 109-530 to immediately end all flood insurance subsidies on nonresidential, vacation and second homes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 347 (Roll no. 323).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Pearce.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
